name: MantlePepe
description: What is the project about? One of the earliest memecoins on the Mantle Mainnet network. We're looking to send this memecoin hard on the new hot network. Coin is new, network is fresh, holders are aplenty and degens are coming for MantlePepe. What makes your project unique? We're implementing an LP burning by milestones. So once marketcap reaches $75k, we'll burn 25% of LP. Then another 25% at $250k marketcap, followed by 25% at $1mil marketcap. Finally, we top it all off with the last 25% burn when $5mil marketcap is reached. History of your project. Less than a day old and we're already top 5 on the Mantle Dexscreener page! Whatâ€™s next for your project? Listed on Bybit is the ultimate goal. What can your token be used for? Speculating
